definitions.definition: Ball s or pieces of ice falling as precipitation , often in connection with a thunderstorm .
An occurrence of this type of precipitation; a hailstorm .
A rapid , intense barrage by a large number of projectiles or other objects.

main_definition: ( meteorology , uncountable ) Ball s or pieces of ice falling as precipitation , often in connection with a thunderstorm .
secondary_definitions: ( meteorology , countable ) An occurrence of this type of precipitation; a hailstorm .
( countable , by extension ) A rapid , intense barrage by a large number of projectiles or other objects.
